meanings.definition: Not easily moved or disturbed; firmly fixed or established.
meanings.sent1: The heavy oak table was very stabiles and didn't wobble at all.
meanings.sent2: The old tree in the backyard was stabiles, standing strong against the wind.

meanings.sent4: Her trust in him was as stabiles as a mountain, unwavering and solid.
meanings.sent5: The fortress walls were stabiles, protecting the kingdom from any attack.
